data.title: The Colorado bigger is great
data.text: Just a quick bit from lunch.. Loved the Colorado burger... Onion ring and fries were ok. I would stop again just for the burger

data.title: OK if you like salty burgers
data.text: I have read about Smash Burgers and finally got to try one on a recent business trip. I got a regular burger, fries, and shake. The burger was OK but both the burger and fries were drowned in salt. I prefer a Five Guys burger and fries to these. The shake was pretty good, not great but a decent value. I don't think I will be hunting for another Smash Burger any time soon.

data.title: Business As Usual
data.text: I ate here on Father's Day-June 2016... Asked for crispy bacon on my burger, it was crispy. Fries were hot & fresh... Burger was hot and fresh. Service was great & courteous. We need a SmashBurger in TN. Keep up the good work SmashBurger!

data.title: Smash Fries with Cipotle Mayo!!
data.text: Ok, so every time we come to Denver and drive by, we have to stop at Smash Burger.  So fresh, so many great choices of the toppings, and the smash fries are to die for!  The manager at this location is such a sweet lady, our daughter has special dietary needs, and she was so kind and accommodating, I cannot say enough good things about her (wish I remembered her name!).  Just eat here, you will thank me later.  Parking is a little hard though, and alot of construction going on currently, so take the back street not Colfax if you can avoid it.

data.title: WOW!!!
data.text: Best burger from a fast food restaurant I have EVER! had.  Fresh and juicy! Right amount of seasoning and condiments. Outstanding food and staff

data.title: If you want a burger!
data.text: The Colorado burger is amazing!!! Pay the extra buck for the big one. I like the regular fries, my husband loves the smash fries. (I believe they ate drizzled with olive oil and rosemary) they also have sweet potato fries. The chocolate malt was delicious and the service was very friendly. I have also had the chicken sandwhiches too and those are good but I loved when they had the crispy chicken.
